00011 #pragma once
00012 
00013 #include <type_traits>
00014 #include "hope/tuple/flat_tuple.h"
00015 
00016 namespace hope {
00017 
00018     template <typename... Ts>
00019     class all final {
00020     public:
00021         template<typename... Vs>
00022         constexpr explicit all(Vs&&... args) noexcept
00023             : tuple(std::forward<Vs>(args)...) { }
00024 
00025         template <typename T>
00026         constexpr bool operator==(const T& rhs) const noexcept {
00027             bool res = true;
00028             for_each(tuple, [&](const auto& lhs) {
00029                 res &= lhs == rhs;
00030             });
00031             return res;
00032         }
00033 
00034         template <typename T>
00035         friend constexpr bool operator==(const T& lhs, const all& rhs) noexcept {
00036             return rhs == lhs;
00037         }
00038 
00039         template <typename T>
00040         constexpr bool operator!=(const T& rhs) const noexcept {
00041             return !((*this) == rhs);
00042         }
00043 
00044         template <typename T>
00045         friend constexpr bool operator!=(const T& lhs, const all& rhs) noexcept {
00046             return rhs != lhs;
00047         }
00048 
00049     private:
00050         flat_tuple<std::decay_t<Ts>...> tuple;
00051     };
00052 
00053     template <typename... Ts>
00054     all(Ts...)->all<Ts...>;
00055 
00056     template <typename... Ts>
00057     class any final {
00058     public:
00059         template<typename... Vs>
00060         constexpr explicit any(Vs&&... args) noexcept
00061             : tuple(std::forward<Vs>(args)...) { }
00062 
00063         template <typename T>
00064         constexpr bool operator==(const T& rhs) const noexcept {
00065             bool res = false;
00066             for_each(tuple, [&](const auto& lhs) {
00067                 res |= lhs == rhs;
00068             });
00069             return res;
00070         }
00071 
00072         template <typename T>
00073         friend constexpr bool operator==(const T& lhs, const any& rhs) noexcept {
00074             return rhs == lhs;
00075         }
00076 
00077         template <typename T>
00078         constexpr bool operator!=(const T& rhs) const noexcept {
00079             return !(tuple == rhs);
00080         }
00081 
00082         template <typename T>
00083         friend constexpr bool operator!=(const T& lhs, const any& rhs) noexcept {
00084             return rhs != lhs;
00085         }
00086 
00087     private:
00088         flat_tuple<std::decay_t<Ts>...> tuple;
00089     };
00090 
00091     template <typename... Ts>
00092     any(Ts...)->any<Ts...>;
00093 }
